divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way to Las vegas from New York on Delta. The pilot announced we were about to pass the Grand Canyon. Looked out the window, seen this stationary object to the north, couldn't make out the shape, but was small and not far at all. I told my friend sitting new to me to check it out and he found it strange as well. It then Made a jog to east, then out of no where, all that could be seen was blurry rings of circles after it disappeared. the circles were not smokey, seemed like circles of vibrations, very strange.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around March 22nd 2007
